Event_Description: EU imposes oil embargo on Iran (nuclear program sanctions tighten)
OPEC decides against production cuts (flood market vs US shale)
China stock market crash and devaluation (demand fears)
JCPOA implementation lifting major Iran sanctions
OPEC agrees production cut (first in years with non-OPEC)
US withdraws from Iran deal and reimposes maximum pressure sanctions
Drone attacks on Saudi Aramco facilities (Abqaiq/Khurais)
Saudi-Russia oil price war (OPEC+ talks collapse)
WHO declares COVID-19 pandemic; global lockdowns begin
OPEC+ agrees record 9.7 mb/d cuts (historic agreement)
Omicron variant emerges (initial demand fears then recovery)
Russia invades Ukraine; immediate Western sanctions on Russian energy
EU US and others impose oil sanctions on Russia (price caps embargoes phased in)
Likely_Brent_Impact: Sustained high prices then partial stabilization
